content: **knitted drops wrist warmers with double moss st and rib alpaca and kid-silk size s - l** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no z-771 yarn group a + a or c --------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - l **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 50-50 g color no 9020 light pearl gray and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio 25-25 g color no 01 off white drops double pointed needles size 4 mm / us 6 - or size needed to get 19 sts x 26 row in stockinette st with 2 strands = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm / us 4 for rib
